name: MulActionTensor
declaration:
/-- A multiplicative action on a tensor structure (e.g. the action of the Lorentz
group on real Lorentz tensors). -/
class MulActionTensor {R : Type} [CommSemiring R] (G : Type) [Monoid G] (ğ“£ : TensorStructure R) : Type

name: TensorStructure.rep_tprod
declaration:
theorem TensorStructure.rep_tprod {R : Type} [CommSemiring R] {G : Type} [Group G] (ğ“£ : TensorStructure R) [MulActionTensor G ğ“£] {X : Type} {cX : X â†’ ğ“£.Color} (g : G) (f : (i : X) â†’ ğ“£.ColorModule (cX i)) : ((TensorStructure.rep ğ“£) g) ((PiTensorProduct.tprod R) f) =
  (PiTensorProduct.tprod R) fun x => ((MulActionTensor.repColorModule (cX x)) g) (f x)

name: TensorStructure.rep_tensoratorEquiv_symm
declaration:
theorem TensorStructure.rep_tensoratorEquiv_symm {R : Type} [CommSemiring R] {G : Type} [Group G] (ğ“£ : TensorStructure R) [MulActionTensor G ğ“£] {X : Type} {Y : Type} [DecidableEq X] [DecidableEq Y] {cX : X â†’ ğ“£.Color} {cY : Y â†’ ğ“£.Color} (g : G) : â†‘(LinearEquiv.symm (TensorStructure.tensoratorEquiv ğ“£ cX cY)) âˆ˜â‚— (TensorStructure.rep ğ“£) g =
  TensorProduct.map ((TensorStructure.rep ğ“£) g) ((TensorStructure.rep ğ“£) g) âˆ˜â‚—
    â†‘(LinearEquiv.symm (TensorStructure.tensoratorEquiv ğ“£ cX cY))

name: MulActionTensor.repColorModule
declaration:
/-- For each color `Î¼` a representation of `G` on `ColorModule Î¼`. -/
def MulActionTensor.repColorModule {R : Type} [CommSemiring R] {G : Type} [Monoid G] {ğ“£ : TensorStructure R} [self : MulActionTensor G ğ“£] (Î¼ : ğ“£.Color) : Representation R G (ğ“£.ColorModule Î¼)

name: TensorStructure.rep_mapIso
declaration:
theorem TensorStructure.rep_mapIso {R : Type} [CommSemiring R] {G : Type} [Group G] (ğ“£ : TensorStructure R) [MulActionTensor G ğ“£] {X : Type} {Y : Type} {cX : X â†’ ğ“£.Color} {cY : Y â†’ ğ“£.Color} (e : X â‰ƒ Y) (h : cX = cY âˆ˜ â‡‘e) (g : G) : (TensorStructure.rep ğ“£) g âˆ˜â‚— â†‘(TensorStructure.mapIso ğ“£ e h) =
  â†‘(TensorStructure.mapIso ğ“£ e h) âˆ˜â‚— (TensorStructure.rep ğ“£) g

name: MulActionTensor.compHom
declaration:
/-- The `MulActionTensor` defined by restriction along a group homomorphism. -/
def MulActionTensor.compHom {R : Type} [CommSemiring R] {G : Type} {H : Type} [Group G] [Group H] (ğ“£ : TensorStructure R) [MulActionTensor G ğ“£] (f : H â†’* G) : MulActionTensor H ğ“£

name: TensorStructure.contrRightAux_contrDual_equivariant_tmul
declaration:
theorem TensorStructure.contrRightAux_contrDual_equivariant_tmul {R : Type} [CommSemiring R] {G : Type} [Group G] (ğ“£ : TensorStructure R) [MulActionTensor G ğ“£] {Î¼ : ğ“£.Color} {Î½ : ğ“£.Color} (g : G) (m : TensorProduct R (ğ“£.ColorModule Î½) (ğ“£.ColorModule Î¼)) (x : ğ“£.ColorModule (ğ“£.Ï„ Î¼)) : (TensorStructure.contrRightAux (ğ“£.contrDual Î¼))
    ((TensorProduct.map ((MulActionTensor.repColorModule Î½) g) ((MulActionTensor.repColorModule Î¼) g)) m âŠ—â‚œ[R]
      ((MulActionTensor.repColorModule (ğ“£.Ï„ Î¼)) g) x) =
  ((MulActionTensor.repColorModule Î½) g) ((TensorStructure.contrRightAux (ğ“£.contrDual Î¼)) (m âŠ—â‚œ[R] x))

name: TensorStructure.tensoratorEquiv_equivariant
declaration:
theorem TensorStructure.tensoratorEquiv_equivariant {R : Type} [CommSemiring R] {G : Type} [Group G] (ğ“£ : TensorStructure R) [MulActionTensor G ğ“£] {X : Type} {Y : Type} [DecidableEq X] [DecidableEq Y] {cX : X â†’ ğ“£.Color} {cY : Y â†’ ğ“£.Color} (g : G) : â†‘(TensorStructure.tensoratorEquiv ğ“£ cX cY) âˆ˜â‚—
    TensorProduct.map ((TensorStructure.rep ğ“£) g) ((TensorStructure.rep ğ“£) g) =
  (TensorStructure.rep ğ“£) g âˆ˜â‚— â†‘(TensorStructure.tensoratorEquiv ğ“£ cX cY)

name: TensorStructure.contrDual_equivariant_tmul
declaration:
theorem TensorStructure.contrDual_equivariant_tmul {R : Type} [CommSemiring R] {G : Type} [Group G] (ğ“£ : TensorStructure R) [MulActionTensor G ğ“£] {Î¼ : ğ“£.Color} (g : G) (x : ğ“£.ColorModule Î¼) (y : ğ“£.ColorModule (ğ“£.Ï„ Î¼)) : (ğ“£.contrDual Î¼) (((MulActionTensor.repColorModule Î¼) g) x âŠ—â‚œ[R] ((MulActionTensor.repColorModule (ğ“£.Ï„ Î¼)) g) y) =
  (ğ“£.contrDual Î¼) (x âŠ—â‚œ[R] y)

name: TensorStructure.rep_mapIso_apply
declaration:
theorem TensorStructure.rep_mapIso_apply {R : Type} [CommSemiring R] {G : Type} [Group G] (ğ“£ : TensorStructure R) [MulActionTensor G ğ“£] {X : Type} {Y : Type} {cX : X â†’ ğ“£.Color} {cY : Y â†’ ğ“£.Color} (e : X â‰ƒ Y) (h : cX = cY âˆ˜ â‡‘e) (g : G) (x : TensorStructure.Tensor ğ“£ cX) : (TensorStructure.mapIso ğ“£ e h) (((TensorStructure.rep ğ“£) g) x) =
  ((TensorStructure.rep ğ“£) g) ((TensorStructure.mapIso ğ“£ e h) x)

name: TensorStructure.tensoratorEquiv_equivariant_apply
declaration:
theorem TensorStructure.tensoratorEquiv_equivariant_apply {R : Type} [CommSemiring R] {G : Type} [Group G] (ğ“£ : TensorStructure R) [MulActionTensor G ğ“£] {X : Type} {Y : Type} [DecidableEq X] [DecidableEq Y] {cX : X â†’ ğ“£.Color} {cY : Y â†’ ğ“£.Color} (g : G) (x : TensorProduct R (TensorStructure.Tensor ğ“£ cX) (TensorStructure.Tensor ğ“£ cY)) : (TensorStructure.tensoratorEquiv ğ“£ cX cY)
    ((TensorProduct.map ((TensorStructure.rep ğ“£) g) ((TensorStructure.rep ğ“£) g)) x) =

name: TensorStructure.rep
declaration:
/-- The representation of the group `G` on the vector space of tensors. -/
def TensorStructure.rep {R : Type} [CommSemiring R] {G : Type} [Group G] (ğ“£ : TensorStructure R) [MulActionTensor G ğ“£] {X : Type} {cX : X â†’ ğ“£.Color} : Representation R G (TensorStructure.Tensor ğ“£ cX)

  â†‘(TensorStructure.colorModuleCast ğ“£ h) âˆ˜â‚— (MulActionTensor.repColorModule Î¼) g

name: TensorStructure.rep_tensoratorEquiv_symm_apply
declaration:
theorem TensorStructure.rep_tensoratorEquiv_symm_apply {R : Type} [CommSemiring R] {G : Type} [Group G] (ğ“£ : TensorStructure R) [MulActionTensor G ğ“£] {X : Type} {Y : Type} [DecidableEq X] [DecidableEq Y] {cX : X â†’ ğ“£.Color} {cY : Y â†’ ğ“£.Color} (g : G) (x : TensorStructure.Tensor ğ“£ (Sum.elim cX cY)) : (LinearEquiv.symm (TensorStructure.tensoratorEquiv ğ“£ cX cY)) (((TensorStructure.rep ğ“£) g) x) =
  (TensorProduct.map ((TensorStructure.rep ğ“£) g) ((TensorStructure.rep ğ“£) g))
    ((LinearEquiv.symm (TensorStructure.tensoratorEquiv ğ“£ cX cY)) x)

name: TensorStructure.rep_lid
declaration:
theorem TensorStructure.rep_lid {R : Type} [CommSemiring R] {G : Type} [Group G] (ğ“£ : TensorStructure R) [MulActionTensor G ğ“£] {X : Type} {cX : X â†’ ğ“£.Color} (g : G) : â†‘(TensorProduct.lid R (TensorStructure.Tensor ğ“£ cX)) âˆ˜â‚— TensorProduct.map LinearMap.id ((TensorStructure.rep ğ“£) g) =
  (TensorStructure.rep ğ“£) g âˆ˜â‚— â†‘(TensorProduct.lid R (TensorStructure.Tensor ğ“£ cX))

declaration:
theorem TensorStructure.rep_tensoratorEquiv_tmul {R : Type} [CommSemiring R] {G : Type} [Group G] (ğ“£ : TensorStructure R) [MulActionTensor G ğ“£] {X : Type} {Y : Type} [DecidableEq X] [DecidableEq Y] {cX : X â†’ ğ“£.Color} {cY : Y â†’ ğ“£.Color} (g : G) (x : TensorStructure.Tensor ğ“£ cX) (y : TensorStructure.Tensor ğ“£ cY) : (TensorStructure.tensoratorEquiv ğ“£ cX cY) (((TensorStructure.rep ğ“£) g) x âŠ—â‚œ[R] ((TensorStructure.rep ğ“£) g) y) =

name: MulActionTensor.mk
declaration:
ctor MulActionTensor.mk {R : Type} [CommSemiring R] {G : Type} [Monoid G] {ğ“£ : TensorStructure R} (repColorModule : (Î¼ : ğ“£.Color) â†’ Representation R G (ğ“£.ColorModule Î¼)) (contrDual_inv : âˆ€ (Î¼ : ğ“£.Color) (g : G),
  ğ“£.contrDual Î¼ âˆ˜â‚— TensorProduct.map ((repColorModule Î¼) g) ((repColorModule (ğ“£.Ï„ Î¼)) g) = ğ“£.contrDual Î¼) (metric_inv : âˆ€ (Î¼ : ğ“£.Color) (g : G), (TensorProduct.map ((repColorModule Î¼) g) ((repColorModule Î¼) g)) (ğ“£.metric Î¼) = ğ“£.metric Î¼) : MulActionTensor G ğ“£

declaration:
theorem TensorStructure.rep_lid_apply {R : Type} [CommSemiring R] {G : Type} [Group G] (ğ“£ : TensorStructure R) [MulActionTensor G ğ“£] {X : Type} {cX : X â†’ ğ“£.Color} (g : G) (x : TensorProduct R R (TensorStructure.Tensor ğ“£ cX)) : (TensorProduct.lid R (TensorStructure.Tensor ğ“£ cX)) ((TensorProduct.map LinearMap.id ((TensorStructure.rep ğ“£) g)) x) =
